com.layers.app.data

Interface UserDataInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDataService

    public interface UserDataInterface
    Contracts the respective data access service for dependency injection. Guarentees its functions are provided and available during runtime.
    See Also:
    UserDataService

      READ Method Validation Login query checks if username exists in the database, case sensitive.

      READ Method Validation Registration query checks if username exists in the database, case insensitive.
